appDesc.message: Easily get notifications when your developped site loading time get too heavy.
appDesc.description: Allows you to set the thresholds to be notified when the page has exceeded the configured limit.

how_to_part1.message: Add url to be notified when the first byte receive time exceeds the set limit.

how_to_part2.message: Ex: https://www.google.com 200ms will apply to all pages starting with https://www.google.com.
